name: Goals
description: Number of goals scored by the player in the game.
formula_or_logic: Count of events where event_type='shot' AND event_detail_1='goal' AND event_player_1 = player_id.
notes: Can also pull from league fact_gameroster for untracked games.

name: Primary Assists
description: Number of primary assists credited to the player.
formula_or_logic: Count events where play_details_1 or event_details_1 indicate 'primary_assist' and player is referenced as assisting player id.
notes: Relies on consistent encoding of primary assist in event_detail or play_detail fields.

name: Secondary Assists
description: Number of secondary assists credited to the player.
formula_or_logic: Same as A1 but using secondary assist markers in details columns.
notes: Often sparse in beer league tracking; may be approximated.

name: Points
description: Total points for the player in a game.
formula_or_logic: P = G + A1 + A2.
notes: Straightforward aggregation once G and assists exist.

name: Time on Ice (All situations)
description: Total time on ice for the player, all strengths and situations.
formula_or_logic: Sum shift_duration_seconds across all logical shifts for the player in fact_shifts_long/logical_shifts.
notes: For untracked games, approximate via shifts count * average shift length.

name: Corsi For
description: Total shot attempts for while player is on ice (shots on goal, misses, blocks).
formula_or_logic: Count events where event_type IN ('shot','missed_shot','blocked_shot') and player's team is event_team AND player is on ice from shifts_long join.
notes: Already approximated in previous boxscore builds; refine classification and on-ice join.

name: Corsi Against
description: Total shot attempts against while player is on ice.
formula_or_logic: Same as CF but event_team is the opposing team when player is on ice.

name: Fenwick For
description: Unblocked shot attempts for while player is on ice.
formula_or_logic: Count events where event_type IN ('shot','missed_shot') and player's team is event_team and player is on ice.
notes: Need to be sure blocked vs unblocked shot tagging is consistent.

name: Fenwick Against
description: Unblocked shot attempts against while player is on ice.
formula_or_logic: Same as FF but for opponent.

name: Expected Goals For
description: Sum of expected goals values for all shot attempts for while player is on ice.
formula_or_logic: Sum xG_event for shots where event_team is player's team and player is on ice (xG derived from xy + shot metadata model).
notes: Requires trained xG model and robust XY + shot context.

name: Expected Goals Against
description: Sum of expected goals values for all shot attempts against while player is on ice.
formula_or_logic: Same as xGF but for opponent's shots while player is on ice.

name: Controlled Zone Entries
description: Number of offensive-zone entries with possession controlled by the player.
formula_or_logic: Count events where event_type='zone_entry' AND event_player_1=player_id AND event_detail_1='controlled' (or equivalent code).

name: Dump-in Zone Entries
description: Number of offensive-zone entries by dumping the puck.
formula_or_logic: Same as ENTRY_CONTROLLED but event_detail_1 like 'dump_in'.

name: Controlled Zone Exits
description: Number of defensive-zone exits where the team retains possession.
formula_or_logic: Count events event_type='zone_exit' AND event_player_1=player_id AND event_detail_1='controlled'.

name: Failed Zone Exits
description: Defensive-zone exit attempts that failed (turnover, icing, etc).
formula_or_logic: Count events where event_type='zone_exit' AND play_successful=0 or event_successful=0 for the player.

name: Completed Passes
description: Number of passes completed by the player.
formula_or_logic: Count events with event_type='pass' AND event_player_1=player_id AND play_successful=1.

name: Pass Attempts
description: Number of pass attempts by the player.
formula_or_logic: Count events with event_type='pass' AND event_player_1=player_id.

name: Pass Completion Percentage
description: Share of attempted passes that are completed.
formula_or_logic: PASS_PCT = PASS_COMPLETED / NULLIF(PASS_ATTEMPT,0).

name: Giveaways (non-dump, non-miss)
description: Turnovers attributed to the player that are not harmless dumps or misses.
formula_or_logic: Count events where event_type='giveaway' AND event_player_1=player_id AND event_detail_1 NOT IN ('dump','clear') AND event_detail_2 NOT LIKE '%missed_shot%'.
notes: Matches your earlier request for 'real' giveaways.

name: Takeaways
description: Number of takeaways credited to the player.
formula_or_logic: Count events where event_type='takeaway' AND event_player_1=player_id.

name: Net-Front Time on Ice
description: Total time the player is in net-front region while on ice.
formula_or_logic: Integrate time in shifts/events where XY location for player falls inside net-front polygon from dim_rinkcoordzones; sum durations.
notes: Depends on tracking density and how often XY is sampled.

name: Rush Shots
description: Shots taken shortly after zone entry with speed, typically within a few seconds.
formula_or_logic: Count shot events where preceding zone_entry by same team & chain within N seconds, sequence tagged as 'rush'.
notes: Aligns with JetsNation/HockeyViz concepts of rush chances.

name: Cycle Possession Time
description: Time spent in sustained offensive-zone cycles.
formula_or_logic: Sum time for sequences where puck remains in OZ, multiple passes, no change of possession, tagged as 'cycle' in chain table.

name: Player Similarity Score
description: Composite similarity score between this player and a reference (e.g. NHL player).
formula_or_logic: Computed via ML embedding of stat vectors; cosine similarity vs reference vector.
primary_data_sources: aggregated season stats across multiple facts, ML model
notes: Designed for Moneyball-style comps (e.g., similarity to Cale Makar).

name: Rating-Adjusted Plus-Minus Context
description: Plus/minus contextualized by average rating of teammates and opponents on ice.
formula_or_logic: Compute standard plus/minus and then annotate with avg/min/max rating of own line and opponent line from dim_player.rating for each GF/GA event.
notes: We already experimented with rating-aware stats; this formalizes that idea.
